Package net.sf.jasperreports.engine.export.oasis

Provides utility classes for exporting reports to Open Document Format, such as ODT and ODS.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GenericElementOdsHandler
    A generic print element ODS export handler.
    GenericElementOdtHandler
    A generic print element ODT export handler.
    JROdsExporterContext
    A context that represents information about an ODS export process.
    JROdtExporterContext
    A context that represents information about an ODT export process.

Package net.sf.jasperreports.engine.export.oasis Description

Provides utility classes for exporting reports to Open Document Format, such as ODT and ODS. Classes in this package are based on the OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications (https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/tc_home.php?wg_abbrev=office).
